entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
